data.text: @AukeHoekstra If you come to close you can hear the nuts and bolts of this mechanical clown squeaking.
@dann_rogge @AukeHoekstra Unlucky that normal people that can't afford to not do pcr tests have had their dna stolen.
@dann_rogge @AukeHoekstra thats some paranoia on both sides

@AukeHoekstra Speculation :
Putin could be rather ill & under cortisone treatment (look at his face & compare 3 years ago).
This could explain his desire of distanciation (fear to get COVID as immune-deprived)…
Under treatment, he could be even more irrational & dangerous… 😱
@AukeHoekstra With Macron it was reported he wouldn’t take a PCR test for COVID

@AukeHoekstra He knows he is in an absolutely crucial phase. Even with best vaccine and medical help, he could be quite sick for weeks. It is currently a total NoGo for him to get it. So could indeed be simply precaution.

@alex_EV3 @AukeHoekstra Zelf denk ik dat die man niet “gek” is maar wel tientalle jaren lang geschoffeerd is. Dat maakt hem vermoedelijk gevaarlijk “dwars”, maar gezien zn loopbaan is hij een intelligente opponent. We moeten hem niet onderschatten en misschien beter tegemoet treden (ondanks die inval).

@alex_EV3 @AukeHoekstra No country should be dependent on the state of mind of its leader. 
I'm looking at you #china.
@alex_EV3 @AukeHoekstra Bied elke deserterende militair ‘n goed thuisland in Europa 🙏😲
